directions.step:
Remove mushroom stems and chop of them to measure « cup... Cook half of the mushroom CAPS in 3 Tb of margarine over medium heat for 5 min., and then drain... Repeate with remaining mushrooms & margarine...
Combine cream cheese, blue cheese, mixing well until blended... Stir in chopped stems and onions, then fill mushroom caps...
Place on cookie sheet and broil until golden brown...
